waypoints.text: print("Long message with way too many words that will overflow the side of the average viewing window and require horizontal scrolling to see every part of the message. The terminal I was working with was 180 chars wide on a 13 inch laptop, so I think I'll need a lot more than that. One problem I realize the scroll test might pose is that if a screen is wide enough, you wouldn't need to scroll. Maybe I'll just pass the test in that case.")
